name: useFavicon
description: Custom hook that sets the document favicon.

props.name: href
props.description: The URL of the favicon to set.

schema.name: preserveFaviconOnUnmount
schema.description: Whether to keep the favicon after unmounting the component (default is `true`). If `false`, the favicon will revert to what it was before this hook mounted.

schema.name: type
schema.description: The MIME type of the favicon (default is `image/x-icon`).
